macro.desc: account or role login fail because server busy

macro.desc: account login fail because client protolcol version not compatible

macro.name: LOGIN_BAN
macro.desc: account or role login fail because system ban the account or role

macro.desc: account login fail because frequency limit

macro.name: LOGIN_ERR
macro.desc: account or role login fail because other reason
